title: Corduroy, a Boy, and a Mostly True Story
description: A rich and captivating story of friends, family, and first love. Will seventeen-year-old Taylor escape the ties that bind her to her dysfunctional family? Can she overcome years of emotional abuse to chase her dreams? Will the boy she loves be able to forgive her mistakes before its too late?A debut novel by Ashley Simmons shows the exhilaration and heartbreak of first love. A witty and charming protagonist combined with exceptional supporting characters make this a book that shouldnâ€™t be missed!If you are looking for a swoon-worthy first love, smart and engaging writing, and a book that stays with you long after you are finished, this book is for you.
author: Ashley   Simmons
